Text: Thanks for this. Unfortunately though, I cant convert it to epub for my reader. Have you by any chance got an epub version?

I know there are a number of applications for converting ebook formats.  

Calibre  (freeware) is the best.

What about the following:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6617881/AVS_Document_Converter_v.2__%28epub_to_PDF__PDF_to_epub__etc%29
Calibre initially wouldn't convert the book. However updating to the latest version and using heuristic processing finally worked. Thanks!!
I wish it had the pictures.
Just kidding! It does have the pictures, I just skipped ahead to a page without a picture.
